```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

donor_share_time_compare = read.csv("data/state_donor_share.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  rename(state = x)

ggplot(donor_share_time_compare, aes(x = year, y = donor_designation_share, color = state)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()


```


```{r}
ny_donor = read_csv("data/organ.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```


```{r}
ny_donor %>%
  mutate(year = as.character(year)) %>%
  mutate(month = as.character(month)) %>%
  mutate(dummy_day = as.character("01")) %>%
  mutate(date = (str_c(year, month, dummy_day, sep = "-"))) %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date, "%Y-%m-%d")) %>% 
  filter(county == "Bronx") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = percent_eligible_population_enrolled)) +
    geom_line()


  
  
  filter(county == "Bronx") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ))
  
```
